Doc File for a FAQ

\begin{Desc}
\item[Author:]: Devresse Adrien\end{Desc}
\paragraph*{1. Which are the main changes from gfal 1.0 ? }

\begin{itemize}
\item GFal 2.0 is independant of the technologies provided ( plugin system )\item GFal 2.0 is now designed to be as POSIX as possible, No non-posix like functions will be provided in the future\item GFal 2.0 provide the getxattr, setxattr, listxattr calls for the plateform's specific calls ( turl resolution, guid resolution, ...)\end{itemize}


\paragraph*{2. I would make a SRM to TURL resolution with GFAL 2.0 and the gfal\_\-srm\_\-plugin, How to do it ? }

\begin{itemize}
\item char turl[2048];\item gfal\_\-getxattr(\char`\"{}srm://masrul/monfichier\char`\"{}, \char`\"{}user.replicas\char`\"{}, turl, 2048);\end{itemize}


\paragraph*{3. I would make a GUID to LFC resolution with GFAL 2.0 and the gfal\_\-lfc\_\-plugin, How to do it ? }

\begin{itemize}
\item char lfn[2048];\item gfal\_\-getxattr(\char`\"{}srm://masrul/monfichier\char`\"{}, \char`\"{}user.guid\char`\"{}, lfn, 2048);\end{itemize}


\paragraph*{4. I want a more verbose error report, How to do it ? }

\begin{itemize}
\item \doxyref{gfal\_\-set\_\-verbose}{p.}{gfal__common__errverbose_8h_df0f68db7d70d7ce1f530c7a51f9cc83}( GFAL\_\-VERBOSE\_\-DEBUG $|$ GFAL\_\-VERBOSE\_\-VERBOSE );\item [...]\item \doxyref{gfal\_\-posix\_\-check\_\-error()}{p.}{group__posix__group_g57ced6eae7afd2d0413988da02fe0373}; // called after each gfal\_\-$\ast$ call\end{itemize}


\paragraph*{4. I need to create a GFAL 2.0 plugin, How to do it ? }

\begin{itemize}
\item a tutorial will come for more details.\end{itemize}


\paragraph*{5 . I need to implement a specific non-POSIX call in GFAL, How to do it ? }

\begin{itemize}
\item just register the proper getxattr or setxattr with a specific key.\end{itemize}


\paragraph*{6. What about the licence ? : }

\begin{itemize}
\item The license is still unchanged from gfal 2.0, It is a Apache 2.0 license : \doxyref{apl}{p.}{apl}\end{itemize}


\paragraph*{7. I get a Communication Error ( ECOMM ) on all my gfal Calls : }

\begin{itemize}
\item In Most of the plugins (lfc, rfio, dcap, srm), this error is due to an access right problem. try to setup your voms-proxy with voms-prox-init --voms [your vo] and try again.\end{itemize}


\paragraph*{8. I Wish add/remove a plugin to the plugin list, How to do it ? }

\begin{itemize}
\item The list of the gfal's plugin is present in the environment variable GFAL\_\-PLUGIN\_\-LIST, you have just to modify this environment variable before start your gfal's program. \end{itemize}
